Title: The House of Smiles
Writer: Liliane Betti, Marco Ferreri, Antonino Marino
Actors: Ingrid Thulin, Dado Ruspoli, Enzo Cannavale, Nuccia Fumo
Plot: Adelina, a former "Miss Smiles" beauty queen, is a resident at a senior citizen retirement home. Her joie de vie and unfaded beauty make her attractive to the male residents, especially Andrea, a dapper and charming but married septuagenarian. Their initial mutual attraction evolves into physical desire, but their families and the conservative culture of the institution conspire against their consummating their love.
